籤詩版本二:
Nhau dzinobva kumusoro dzakaoma kunzwisisa. Usatarisira zvakawanda.
Kudai waizokuya dombo mugirazi, waitoziva kuti kuedza kwako kwaiva pasina.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inochengetedza mufananidzo wekugara wakanyarara.
Kuzvichengeta iwe pachako mune zvese zvinounza rombo rakanaka.
解曰: Mhando dzose dzemanomano. Kupambadza nhamburiko. Zviri nani kuve wakachengetedza. Chikonzero chii?
籤詩故事一:
◇Musikana weginger ari kutsvaga murume
Munguva yeQin Dynasty, apo Meng Jiangnu aive mambo wekutanga weQin Dynasty, pahusiku hwemuchato wake, murume wake Fan Qiliang (Wan Xiliang) akasungwa akatumirwa kunovaka Rusvingo Huru. Meng Jiangnu akafamba zviuru zvemakiromita kuti atumire murume wake mbatya dzinodziya. Zvakatora nguva yakareba kuti asvike kuGreat Wall, asi pakupedzisira akaudzwa kuti murume wake akanga afa uye mutumbi wake wakavigwa pasi peGreat Wall. Meng Jiangnu akachema, uye Rusvingo Rukuru rwakakoromoka, uye zvisaririra zvomurume wake zvakawanwa zvine ropa richiyerera pamurwi wamapfupa. Qin Shihuang saka akadaidza Meng Jiangnu, uyo akarohwa nehana zvekuti akada kutora Meng Jiangnu semurongo wake. Fan Qiliang, Meng Jiangnu akabata mutumbi wemurume wake panzvimbo yeTemberi yeMeng Jiangnu nhasi.Maaive ari, akazvikanda mugungwa ipapo ipapo.
聖意: Kuchengeteka pamba, kuzvichengetedza, hupfumi, kutengeserana kwakanaka, kuroora, kusawirirana, Liujia vakadzi vanofamba netsoka, minda inotama, makonye, ​​kukuvara kwezvipfuyo, kunetsa kuwana vanhu, kumatare edzimhosva, kurasikirwa, kutama, kurasikirwa pfuma, kurwara, midziyo, kutumira kuguva reAnshan, Rombo rakanaka
